item.title: Refactored dotfiles
item.description: Finally, I managed to update my dotfiles today and change for chezmoi for managing them properly. It took a bit of time, but I’m quite happy with the result now. If you are interested you can find them here.

item.title: My first post
item.description: I guess my first post should be something funny so here is one pic of my sleeping dogs. I hope my next post will be something more useful though :)

item.title: J칩zsef G치bor L치z치r
item.description: Currently, I’m working as a Backend Engineer at raffle.ai where I’m continuously trying to improve our awesome products backend services. Before that I had worked for two big European companies for five years, where I could try myself in different fields. At Continental I had the chance to work on a front facing camera development based on AI technologies and at Nokia I was part of a huge global team which was across four different countries (Greece, USA, India and Hungary).
